PHRASE.LANG: What do you mean, “too much logo, not enough shirt?” Our clothing equation is flawless! [#Legal]
Comment ça, “le logo est trop grand, le t-shirt pas assez ?” Les proportions sont parfaites ! [#Legal]
Was heißt hier “zu viel Logo, zu wenig T-Shirt?” Unsere Kleidungsratio ist makellos! [#Legal]
Cosa dici? "Troppo logo e poca maglietta?" La nostra equazione in questo capo è perfetta! [#Legal]
¿Qué quieres decir con "demasiado logo para tan poca camiseta"? ¡La ecuación de nuestra ropa no tiene tacha! [#Legal]
What do you mean, “too much logo, not enough shirt?” Our clothing equation is flawless! [#Legal]
